questions.text: How likely is it that, at some point in your life, you will be responsible for caring for an aging parent or family member?
What industry or field do you currently work in? If you have multiple jobs, please choose the one that you consider to be your main or primary occupation.

valid_options.raw: Banking, finance, accounting, real estate, or insurance
valid_options.text: Banking, finance, accounting, real estate, or insurance

questions.text: Do you think the following will or will not happen in the next 20 years? Doctors will rely on computer programs to diagnose most diseases and determine treatments

Do you think the following will or will not happen in the next 20 years? Most stores and retail businesses will be fully automated and involve little or no human interaction between customers and employees
Do you think the following will or will not happen in the next 20 years? Most deliveries in cities will be made by robots or drones instead of humans
Do you think the following will or will not happen in the next 20 years? When people want to buy most common products, they will create them at home using a 3-D printer
How much have you seen or heard about the effort to develop driverless vehicles - that is, cars and trucks that can operate on their own without a human driver?
Has what you've seen or heard about driverless vehicles been mostly positive, mostly negative, or a mix of both?
How enthusiastic are you, if at all, about the development of driverless vehicles?
How worried are you, if at all, about the development of driverless vehicles?
How long, if ever, do you think it will take for most of the vehicles on the road to be driverless, rather than driven by humans?
Would you, personally, want to ride in a driverless vehicle if you had the opportunity?
How safe would you feel sharing the road with a driverless passenger vehicle?
How safe would you feel sharing the road with a driverless freight truck?
If driverless vehicles become widespread, do you think that the number of people killed or injured in traffic accidents will increase, decrease, or stay about the same?
Would you strongly favor, favor, oppose, or strongly oppose the following rules and regulations for driverless vehicles? Requiring them to travel in dedicated lanes
Would you strongly favor, favor, oppose, or strongly oppose the following rules and regulations for driverless vehicles? Restricting them from traveling near certain areas, such as schools

Would you strongly favor, favor, oppose, or strongly oppose the following rules and regulations for driverless vehicles? Requiring them to have a person in the driver's seat who could take control in an emergency situation
If driverless vehicles become widespread, which of the following do you think are likely to happen as a result? Elderly and disabled people will be able to live more independently
If driverless vehicles become widespread, which of the following do you think are likely to happen as a result? Many people who drive for a living would lose their jobs
If driverless vehicles become widespread, which of the following do you think are likely to happen as a result? Owning a car would become much less important to people
If driverless vehicles become widespread, which of the following do you think are likely to happen as a result? Most people would never learn how to drive a car on their own
If driverless vehicles become widespread, which of the following do you think are likely to happen as a result? There would be much less traffic in major cities
On a different subject, would you say that society generally places too much importance on working and having a job, not enough importance on working and having a job, or is it just about right?
What impact have the following technologies had on you and your job or career? Industrial robots
What impact have the following technologies had on you and your job or career? Word processing or spreadsheet software
What impact have the following technologies had on you and your job or career? Email or social media
What impact have the following technologies had on you and your job or career? Software that manages your daily work schedule or routine
What impact have the following technologies had on you and your job or career? Smartphones
What impact have the following technologies had on you and your job or career? Technologies that help customers serve themselves on their own
Thinking about how demanding your work is, has technology generally made your work
Thinking about how interesting your work is, has technology generally made your work
Thinking about opportunities for advancement in your career, do you feel that technology has

Please consider the following scenario - in the future, robots and computers with advanced capabilities may be able to do most of the jobs that are currently done by humans today. How much have you heard, read, or thought about this idea before today?
Based on what you know, does the idea of robots and computers being able to do most of the jobs currently done by humans in the future seem
How enthusiastic are you, if at all, about the possibility of robots and computers being able to do most of the jobs currently done by humans in the future, for society as a whole?
How worried are you, if at all, about the possibility of robots and computers being able to do most of the jobs currently done by humans in the future, for society as a whole?

Do you think the following are likely to happen as a result of robots and computers being able to do most of the jobs currently done by humans in the future? Inequality between rich and poor would be much worse than it is today

Do you think the following are likely to happen as a result of robots and computers being able to do most of the jobs currently done by humans in the future? People would have a hard time finding things to do with their lives

Do you think the following are likely to happen as a result of robots and computers being able to do most of the jobs currently done by humans in the future? People would be able to focus less on work and more on the things that really matter to them in life

Do you think the following are likely to happen as a result of robots and computers being able to do most of the jobs currently done by humans in the future? The economy as a whole would be much more efficient

Do you think the following are likely to happen as a result of robots and computers being able to do most of the jobs currently done by humans in the future? The economy would create many new, better-paying jobs for humans

Do you think the following are likely to happen as a result of robots and computers being able to do most of the jobs currently done by humans in the future? Humans would find their jobs more meaningful and fulfilling since machines would mostly be doing things that humans find unappealing
Would you favor or oppose the following? If robots and computers were mostly limited to doing jobs that are dangerous or unhealthy for humans to do
Would you favor or oppose the following? If people had the option of paying extra to interact with a human, rather than a robot or computer, when buying a product or service

Would you favor or oppose the following? If the federal government created a national service program that paid people to perform tasks even if a robot or computer could do those tasks faster or cheaper
Which of the following statements best describes how you feel, even if neither is exactly right?

valid_options.raw: The government would have an obligation to take care of people whose jobs are displaced by robots and computers
valid_options.text: The government would have an obligation to take care of people whose jobs are displaced by robots and computers

valid_options.raw: Individuals would have an obligation to take care of their own financial well-being, even if robots and computers
valid_options.text: Individuals would have an obligation to take care of their own financial well-being, even if robots and computers

questions.text: Which of the following statements best describes how you feel, even if neither is exactly right?

valid_options.raw: If businesses can receive better work at lower cost by replacing humans with robots and computers, they are justified
valid_options.text: If businesses can receive better work at lower cost by replacing humans with robots and computers, they are justified

valid_options.raw: There should be limits on how many jobs businesses can replace with robots and computers, even if they can do those
valid_options.text: There should be limits on how many jobs businesses can replace with robots and computers, even if they can do those

questions.text: Do you think it is very likely, somewhat likely, not very likely, or not at all likely that the job of a software engineer will be mostly replaced by robots or computers in your lifetime?
Do you think it is very likely, somewhat likely, not very likely, or not at all likely that the job of a legal clerk will be mostly replaced by robots or computers in your lifetime?
Do you think it is very likely, somewhat likely, not very likely, or not at all likely that the job of a nurse will be mostly replaced by robots or computers in your lifetime?
Do you think it is very likely, somewhat likely, not very likely, or not at all likely that the job of a construction worker will be mostly replaced by robots or computers in your lifetime?
Do you think it is very likely, somewhat likely, not very likely, or not at all likely that the job of a fast food worker will be mostly replaced by robots or computers in your lifetime?
Do you think it is very likely, somewhat likely, not very likely, or not at all likely that the job of a teacher will be mostly replaced by robots or computers in your lifetime?
Do you think it is very likely, somewhat likely, not very likely, or not at all likely that the job of a insurance claims processor will be mostly replaced by robots or computers in your lifetime?
How likely, if at all, do you think it is that your own job or profession will be mostly done by robots or computers in your lifetime?
Have you yourself ever lost a job because your employer replaced your position with a machine, robot or computer program?
Have you ever had your pay or hours reduced because your employer replaced some aspect of your job with a machine, robot or computer program?
Do you personally know anyone who has lost a job, or had their pay or hours reduced, because their employer replaced their work with a machine, robot or computer program?

Please consider the following scenario - in the future, people could be provided with a robot caregiver that would allow them to continue living in their own home as they age. How much have you heard, read, or thought about this idea before today?
Based on what you know does the concept of a robot caregiver for the elderly seem
How enthusiastic are you, if at all, about the possibility of a robot caregiver for society as a whole?
How worried are you, if at all, about the possibility of a robot caregiver for society as a whole?
Would you, personally, be interested in this type of robot caregiver for yourself or a member of your family?

If robot caregivers such as these were developed, do you think the following are likely or not likely to happen as a result? Young people would feel less worried about caring for their aging relatives
If robot caregivers such as these were developed, do you think the following are likely or not likely to happen as a result? Society would save money on caring for older adults
If robot caregivers such as these were developed, do you think the following are likely or not likely to happen as a result? Many older adults would treat their robot caregiver like a human friend
If robot caregivers such as these were developed, do you think the following are likely or not likely to happen as a result? Older adults would feel more isolated than they do today
If robot caregivers such as these were developed, do you think the following are likely or not likely to happen as a result? Older adults would feel more independent and self-sufficient

If robot caregivers such as these were developed, do you think the following are likely or not likely to happen as a result? These robots would only be used by people who could not afford a human caregiver for their loved one
Would you feel better, worse, or would it not make a difference if the robot caregiver in this scenario had a camera so that a human operator could monitor the situation at all times?
Please consider the following scenario - computer programs being used to screen and rank job applicants. How much have you heard, read, or thought about this idea before today?
Based on what you know, does the concept of using computer programs to make hiring decisions seem
How enthusiastic are you, if at all, about the possibility of using computer programs to make hiring decisions for society as a whole?
How worried are you, if at all, about the possibility of using computer programs to make hiring decisions for society as a whole?
Would you, personally, want to apply for a job that used this type of computer program to make hiring decisions?
Do you think computer programs for hiring would do a better job, a worse job, or do about the same as humans when it comes to hiring candidates who are well-qualified
Do you think computer programs for hiring would do a better job, a worse job, or do about the same as humans when it comes to hiring candidates who fit well with the company's culture
Do you think computer programs for hiring would do a better job, a worse job, or do about the same as humans when it comes to choosing candidates from a diverse range of backgrounds
Do you think computer programs for hiring would do a better job, a worse job, or do about the same as humans when it comes to providing opportunities for candidates with non-traditional experiences

Would you feel better or worse about computer programs making hiring decisions if these computer programs included public data about each candidate - such as the material they post on social media - in making their evaluations

Would you feel better or worse about computer programs making hiring decisions if companies used these computer programs to conduct initial screenings of potential candidates, but then interviewed those candidates in the traditional way
Do you ever use a voice-controlled digital assistant, such as Apple Siri, Amazon Alexa, Google Assistant, or Microsoft Cortana?
Do you ever use a digital assistant to control other devices in your home, such as a stereo, tv, thermostat, or lighting?
When you use digital assistants, how often do they accurately respond to your commands?
Which of the following, if any, are reasons why you use a voice-controlled digital assistant? It lets me use my phone or device while doing other things with my hands
Which of the following, if any, are reasons why you use a voice-controlled digital assistant? Spoken language feels more natural than typing
Which of the following, if any, are reasons why you use a voice-controlled digital assistant? It's easier for children to use
Which of the following, if any, are reasons why you use a voice-controlled digital assistant? It's fun
Do you personally own a flying drone?
Have you ever seen someone operating a drone?
Do you think that private citizens should or should not be allowed to pilot drones in the following areas? Near people's homes
Do you think that private citizens should or should not be allowed to pilot drones in the following areas? Near crime scenes or traffic accidents
Do you think that private citizens should or should not be allowed to pilot drones in the following areas? On beaches
Do you think that private citizens should or should not be allowed to pilot drones in the following areas? In public parks
Do you think that private citizens should or should not be allowed to pilot drones in the following areas? At events, like concerts or rallies
Which part of the United States do you currently live in?

valid_options.natural_language: I live in the Midwest of the United States.
I live in the Northeast of the United States.
I live in the South of the United States.
I live in the West of the United States.

questions.text: How old are you?
What is the sex that you were assigned at birth?
What is the highest level of schooling or degree that you have completed?

valid_options.natural_language: I did not graduate from high school.

questions.text: Are you a citizen of the United States?

valid_options.natural_language: I am not a citizen of the United States.
I am a citizen of the United States.

questions.text: Which of these best describes you?

valid_options.natural_language: I am living with a partner.
I am separated from my partner.

questions.text: What is your present religion, if any?

valid_options.natural_language: Religiously speaking, I am a member of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints.
Religiously speaking, I don't identify with anything in particular.
Religiously speaking, I am not mainstream.
Religiously speaking, I am Roman Catholic.

questions.text: Aside from weddings and funerals, how often do you attend religious services?

valid_options.natural_language: I attend religious services a few times a year.
I attend religious services more than once a week.
I attend religious services once a week.
I attend religious services once or twice a month.

questions.text: In politics today, what do you consider yourself?
Last year, what was your total family income from all sources, before taxes?

valid_options.natural_language: Last year, my household income was $100,000 or more before taxes.
Last year, my household income was $30,000-$50,000 before taxes.
Last year, my household income was $50,000-$75,000 before taxes.
Last year, my household income was $75,000-$100,000 before taxes.
Last year, my household income was less than $30,000 before taxes.

questions.text: In general, how would you describe your political ideology?
What is your race or origin?
